title: Priya Pushpa Karnam: Emerald, Ruby & Diamond Floral Stud Earrings
materials: Round Cut Rubies (Godeelu). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: These stud earrings draw inspiration from traditional South Indian floral motifs. The central emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds, forming the core of the 'pushpa' (flower). Delicately placed rubies adorn the edges, adding a touch of traditional color and vibrancy. The openwork gold design enhances the gemstone brilliance, crafted with meticulous attention to detail and lightweight comfort.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift (danam) for loved ones. A subtle yet elegant addition to any South Indian or modern ensemble.
description: Blending traditional design with modern wearability, these earrings feature high-quality gemstones and superior craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, making this a cherished addition to your jewelry collection. Comfortable for everyday wear, yet elegant enough for special occasions. Symbolizing beauty, prosperity, and good fortune.
